info.title: Nishnaabemwin Spellchecker
info.description: Spellchecker for the Nishnaabemwin dialects of Ojibwe (especially Odawa aka Daawaa) produced by Dustin Bowers with support from the National Endowment for the Humanities

errmodel.title: Default corrections
errmodel.description: An error model for text typically entered in a text editor. The model is balanced between fast response times and more relevant correction suggestions.
